TopicTitle: I wanted to have a go at a tribute to the intro song

Articles.Content:
It started that way, you can hear it in there a bit...but then I...well...embellished a bit. Then said, heck with it, make it me. This time I got to have some real fun since I recently purchased EWQL Orchestra Silver ed.

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/the-clever-man

So...there went my tribute idea, but still...

Let me know what you think!
